gobblin.cluster

Class GobblinTaskRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.cluster.GobblinTaskRunner

  • @Alpha
public class GobblinTaskRunner
extends Object
    The main class running in the containers managing services for running Gobblin WorkUnits.

    This class serves as a Helix participant and it uses a HelixManager to work with Helix. This class also uses the Helix task execution framework and GobblinHelixTaskFactory class for creating GobblinHelixTasks that Helix manages to run Gobblin data ingestion tasks.

    This class responds to a graceful shutdown initiated by the GobblinClusterManager via a Helix message of subtype HelixMessageSubTypes.WORK_UNIT_RUNNER_SHUTDOWN, or it does a graceful shutdown when the shutdown hook gets called. In both cases, stop() will be called to start the graceful shutdown.

    If for some reason, the container exits or gets killed, the GobblinClusterManager will be notified for the completion of the container and will start a new container to replace this one.
